title: Print, ""Baxter" Print: Gems of the Great Exhibition of 1851, Gem No.1", 1852
medium:
Lithograph, with woodblock-printed oil inks, ruled borders in gold paint
Support: white wove paper laid down on white wove paper
markings: Blind stamp, lower margin, center in a cartouche: PRINTED IN OIL / COLOURS / BY / G. BAXTER / INVENTORS / PATENTEE / 11 & 12 NORTHAMPTON SQUARE / THE GEMS OF THE GREAT / EXHIBITION
description: Interior, The French Department; statuary:"sabrina," center; "Psyche," left; "A Nymph," right. Arched top mounted in gold border

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ""Baxter" Print: Gems of the Great Exhibition of 1851, Gem No.1", 1852.
1852. Lithograph, with woodblock-printed oil inks, ruled borders in gold paint
Support: white wove paper laid down on white wove paper. Gift of Whitney Hartshorne. 1954-127-13-a.
